nodes.text: John Barry (1935 – June 1, 1979) was a British production designer. He served as production designer for Star Wars, and as a second unit director on The Empire Strikes Back. Two weeks into filming the latter (May 31, 1979), he collapsed on set and was hospitalized as his temperature rose to 104 degrees Farenheit (40 degrees Celsius). He died at 2am on June 1, a victim of meningitis. His memorial was held on June 11 at St. Paul's church, Grove Road, London (bordering Hounslow and Chiswick). He was cremated that day.
